tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE SurveyResponses (
 response_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
 survey_id INT, 
 respondent_id INT, 
 response_text VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE SurveyQuestions (
 question_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
 survey_id INT, 
 question_text VARCHAR, 
 option_1 VARCHAR, 
 option_2 VARCHAR, 
 option_3 VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE SurveyAnswers (
 answer_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
 response_id INT, 
 question_id INT, 
 selected_option VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE SurveyCategories (
 category_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
 category_name VARCHAR, 
 question_id INT
)
CREATE TABLE survey_responses (response_id INT PRIMARY KEY, survey_id INT, question_id INT, response_text TEXT, respondent_id INT)
CREATE TABLE surveys (survey_id INT PRIMARY KEY, survey_title TEXT, survey_description TEXT)
CREATE TABLE questions (question_id INT PRIMARY KEY, question_text TEXT, question_type TEXT)
CREATE TABLE categories (category_id INT PRIMARY KEY, category_name TEXT)
CREATE TABLE response_categories (response_id INT, category_id INT, PRIMARY KEY (response_id, category_id))
